(m) [Kohle]
20011170 4E800020
0400F2CC 60000000
0400F56C 38033400
C6011170 800018A8
E2000001 80008000
206CBA24 4E800020
046C7A88 60000000
046C7E30 38033400
C66CBA24 800018A8
E2000001 80008000


With the following AR codes, you are able to copy GameCube PSO 1&2 Plus game saves from one memory
card to another.

Make Game Save Copyable [Ralf]
20386974 909C0028
0600C420 00000010
38000004 981C0034
38000000 4837A550
04386978 4BC85AA8
E2000001 80008000

Make Game Save Valid [Ralf]
201FD7D0 7C040040
041FD7CC 7C0521AE
041FD7D4 4800000C
041FD870 7C0521AE
041FD878 4800000C
E2000001 80008000

How to use these codes:

1. Save your game with the 'Make Game Save Copyable' code turned on and your source memory card
   in port A:

   To save your System file, go into the options menu from start screen and go back.
   To save your Character and Guildcard file, go ingame and quit.

2. Copy your System, Character and Guildcard file from your source memory card to your destination
   memory card (via GameCube system menu).

3. Start PSO with your destination memory card in port A and save your System file with the 'Make
   Game Save Valid' code turned on. Your game save is valid now and works fine without AR codes.

4. Please note that you cannot mix different game saves, because all Character and Guildcard files
   are encrypted with a unique timestamp (stored in the System file).

06000088 00000010

E2000001 80008000

Character Model Modifier [Ralf]
2028E444 7C7F1B78
0428E448 386000xx
0428E44C 4800006C
E2000001 80008000

xx = Model ID


Model IDs

00 - HUmar
01 - HUnewearl
02 - HUcast
03 - RAmar
04 - RAcast
05 - RAcaseal
06 - FOmarl
07 - FOnewm
08 - FOnewearl
09 - HUcaseal
0A - FOmar
0B - RAmarl
0C - Elly   (Base model must be a Hunter with hair/head type 1)
0D - Flowen (Base model must be a Hunter or Ranger with hair/head type 1)
0E - Tails
0F - Knuckles
10 - Sonic
11 - Rico   (Base model must be a Hunter or Ranger with hair/head type 1)
12 - Ninja  (Base model must be a Hunter with hair/head type 1)

Colors

<tab>CK - Light Grey
<tab>CL - Red
<tab>CM - Orange
<tab>CN - Yellow
<tab>CO - Light Green
<tab>CP - Light Blue
<tab>CQ - Light Purple
<tab>CR - Medium Grey 1
<tab>CS - Medium Grey 2
<tab>CT - Dark Red
<tab>CU - Brown
<tab>CV - Olive
<tab>CW - Dark Green
<tab>CX - Dark Blue
<tab>CY - Dark Purple
<tab>CZ - Dark Grey

Player Speed Modifier [Ralf]
201C5BB4 D003001C
041C5BB0 C002C610
045DC320 xxxxxxxx
045DC3B0 yyyyyyyy
E2000001 80008000

xxxxxxxx = Walking Speed (IEEE-754 SP Floating-Point Number, Default: 3F800000 = 1.0)
yyyyyyyy = Running Speed (IEEE-754 SP Floating-Point Number, Default: 3FC00000 = 1.5)

Have Four Action Button Palettes (C-Stick Version) [Ralf]
201D7C70 7C9C2378
0600CD00 000000F0
3C808000 6084CF3E
3BE00000 A0C4003A
2C060000 41820074
B3E4003A 3C608051
A003E274 A0A3E270
7CA53038 70003C00
41820058 5403056B
41820008 3BC0002A
540304A5 41820008
3BC0001C 54030529
41820008 3BC0000E
7C84F214 38000007
7C0903A6 387C0504
2C050003 4082000C
A0030004 B0040002
A4040002 B4030004
4200FFE8 3BC00000
481CAEF4 38600003
3C808001 B064CF78
7FC3F378 48269FAC
3D808044 618CE5D0
80030000 7C006000
A0030004 40820018
2C000000 40820010
38600001 3D808001
B06CCF78 4823F7D0
3C608000 6063CF3E
3800001C 7C0903A6
38000000 B4030002
4200FFFC 48329974
041D7C78 4BE35088
042473F4 A01F004A
042473F8 54030637
0424C598 4BDC0808
04276D44 4BD96048
04276DA4 A01F004A
04276DA8 54030637
0433675C 4BCD6674
E2000001 80008000

This code will let you have up to four different palettes of action buttons.


Battle Screen Control Keys

C-Stick Left  = Select Palette 1
C-Stick Down  = Select Palette 2
C-Stick Right = Select Palette 3
C-Stick Up    = Select Palette 4

Customize Menu Control Keys

C-Stick Left  = Load Palette 1 As Active Button Selection
C-Stick Down  = Load Palette 2 As Active Button Selection
C-Stick Right = Load Palette 3 As Active Button Selection
C-Stick Up    = Load Palette 4 As Active Button Selection

Hold L+R and press ...

C-Stick Left  = Save Active Button Selection As Palette 1
C-Stick Down  = Save Active Button Selection As Palette 2
C-Stick Right = Save Active Button Selection As Palette 3
C-Stick Up    = Save Active Button Selection As Palette 4


Have Four Action Button Palettes (D-Pad Version) [Ralf]
201D7C70 7C9C2378
0600CD00 000000F0
3C808000 6084CF3E
3BE00000 A0C4003A
2C060000 41820074
B3E4003A 3C608051
A003E276 A0A3E270
7CA53038 700000F0
41820058 540306F7
41820008 3BC0002A
54030631 41820008
3BC0001C 540306B5
41820008 3BC0000E
7C84F214 38000007
7C0903A6 387C0504
2C050003 4082000C
A0030004 B0040002
A4040002 B4030004
4200FFE8 3BC00000
481CAEF4 38600003
3C808001 B064CF78
7FC3F378 48269FAC
3D808044 618CE5D0
80030000 7C006000

2C000000 40820010
38600001 3D808001
B06CCF78 4823F7D0
3C608000 6063CF3E
3800001C 7C0903A6
38000000 B4030002
4200FFFC 48329974
041D7C78 4BE35088
042473F4 A01F0048
042473F8 540304AB
0424C598 4BDC0808
04276D44 4BD96048
04276DA4 A01F0048
04276DA8 540304AB
0433675C 4BCD6674
E2000001 80008000

This code will let you have up to four different palettes of action buttons.


Battle Screen Control Keys

D-Pad Left  = Select Palette 1
D-Pad Down  = Select Palette 2
D-Pad Right = Select Palette 3
D-Pad Up    = Select Palette 4

Customize Menu Control Keys

D-Pad Left  = Load Palette 1 As Active Button Selection
D-Pad Down  = Load Palette 2 As Active Button Selection
D-Pad Right = Load Palette 3 As Active Button Selection
D-Pad Up    = Load Palette 4 As Active Button Selection

Hold L+R and press ...

D-Pad Left  = Save Active Button Selection As Palette 1
D-Pad Down  = Save Active Button Selection As Palette 2
D-Pad Right = Save Active Button Selection As Palette 3
D-Pad Up    = Save Active Button Selection As Palette 4

L (Hold)              = Debug Mode On  (Temporary)
L (Hold) + DPad Right = Debug Mode Off (Temporary)
DPad Left/Right       = Debug Mode On/Off

Equipped Mag Color Modifier (Permanently) [Ralf]
20111494 7C781B78
04111498 386000xx
0411149C 987B01A6
E2000001 80008000

xx = Mag Color ID (00 .. 11)

Equipped Mag Color Modifier v1 (Temporary) [Ralf]
20111494 7C781B78
04113E74 386000xx
E2000001 80008000

xx = Mag Color ID (00 .. 11)

Equipped Mag Color Modifier v2 (Temporary) [Ralf]
20111494 7C781B78
041114A8 3CA08000
041114B0 60A5C390
0600C390 00000010
3F800000 rrrrrrrr
gggggggg bbbbbbbb
E2000001 80008000

rrrrrrrr = Red   (IEEE-754 SP Floating-Point Number, 0.0 .. 1.0)
gggggggg = Green (IEEE-754 SP Floating-Point Number, 0.0 .. 1.0)
bbbbbbbb = Blue  (IEEE-754 SP Floating-Point Number, 0.0 .. 1.0)

Merge Color Modifier (Temporary) [Ralf]
20118238 7FC3F378
0600C590 00000030
807E0024 28030000
41820024 881E00EE
2800003A 41800018
28000049 41810010
3C00rrgg 6000bbFF
90030798 4810BCA4
0411825C 4BEF4334
E2000001 80008000

rr = Red   (00 .. FF)
gg = Green (00 .. FF)
bb = Blue  (00 .. FF)


Default Colors (rrggbb)

00F5B3 - Cyan       (Anti & Resta Merge)
0867FF - Dark Blue  (Deband Merge)
3FCCE1 - Light Blue (Barta, Gibarta, Rabarta & Blue Merge)
EBE700 - Yellow     (Zonde, Gizonde, Razonde & Yellow Merge)
FF2138 - Red        (Shifta Merge)
FF713F - Orange     (Foie, Gifoie, Rafoie & Red Merge)

as a plain text keyword: "<sid0>" ... "<sid9>" (w/o quotation marks).

Mag Evolution Levels Modifier [Ralf]
20112554 7FC3F378
0443E534 000000ii
0443E538 000000jj
0443E53C 000000kk
041119AC 2C0000ll
E2000001 80008000

ii = 1st Evolution Level (05 .. C8, Default: 0A = Level  10)
jj = 2nd Evolution Level (05 .. C8, Default: 23 = Level  35)
kk = 3rd Evolution Level (05 .. C8, Default: 32 = Level  50)
ll = 4th Evolution Level (0A .. C8, Default: 64 = Level 100)

The 3rd evolution level must be a multiple of five and
the 4th evolution level must be a multiple of ten.


Mag Specials Modifier [Ralf]
20111150 7C7E1B78
04111154 3CA0sstt
04111158 60A5uuvv
04111160 90A301BD
04111164 3CA0wwxx
0411116C 60A5yyzz
04111170 90A301C1
E2000001 80008000

ss = Special 1 ID (Full PB Gauge)
tt = Special 2 ID (1/10 HP)
uu = Special 3 ID (Death)
vv = Special 4 ID (Boss Fight)

ww = Special 1 Chance Type
xx = Special 2 Chance Type
yy = Special 3 Chance Type
zz = Special 4 Chance Type


Special IDs

00 - Nothing
04 - Deband/Shifta
06 - Healing
07 - Resurrection
08 - Invincibility


Chance Types

00 - Mag Base Chance
01 - Mag Base Chance + Synchro Boost
02 - Synchro  Boost
03 - Mag Base Chance - 10
04 - Synchro  Boost  - 10


Mag Specials Chance Modifier v1 [Ralf]
20111150 7C7E1B78
041110E8 380000xx
E2000001 80008000

xx = Specials Chance (00 .. 64)


Mag Specials Chance Modifier v2 [Ralf]
20111150 7C7E1B78
04110FF4 38A000vv
04111004 38A000ww
04111014 38A000xx
04111024 38A000yy
0411102C 38A000zz
04111074 3BE000mm
0411107C 380000mm
04111094 386000mm
E2000001 80008000

mm = Mag Base Chance (00 .. 64)

vv = Synchro   0% -  30% Boost (00 .. 64, Default: 00)
ww = Synchro  31% -  60% Boost (00 .. 64, Default: 0F)
xx = Synchro  61% -  80% Boost (00 .. 64, Default: 19)
yy = Synchro  81% - 100% Boost (00 .. 64, Default: 1E)
zz = Synchro 101% - 120% Boost (00 .. 64, Default: 23)

02 - Yellow

04 - Purple

0B - Olive

11 - Dark Cyan

0C - Zalure

Ul Ray: Confusion/Paralysis Attack Modifier [Ralf]
203092D0 7FA3EB78
04308A24 380000xx
04308A30 380000yy
04308A3C 380000zz
E2000001 80008000

xx = Attack 1 ID (Ultimate Difficulty, Default: 10 = Paralysis)
yy = Attack 2 ID (Ultimate Difficulty, Default: 10 = Paralysis)
zz = Attack 3 ID (N/H/VH   Difficulty, Default: 12 = Confusion)

02 - Freeze
03 - Shock
0B - Jellen
0C - Zalure
0F - Poison
10 - Paralysis
11 - Slow
12 - Confusion

Control Keys

L + R + Z = Save Active Button Selection As Palette (Customize Menu)

1CA52798 7C842A14

04200494 4BE0B75D

Redirect actual save slot to another save slot.

ss = Save Slot

00 - Slot 1
01 - Slot 2
02 - Slot 3
03 - Slot 4
04 - Slot 5 (Temp Slot 1)
05 - Slot 6 (Temp Slot 2)
06 - Slot 7 (Temp Slot 3)

Character Type Modifier [Ralf]
48000000 8050EA10
DE000000 80B08180
14000894 00ii00jj
14000898 00kk00ll
1200089C 000000mm
E0000000 80008000

jj = Skin/Body Type (00 .. 03, 00 .. 18)

ii = Costume   (00 .. 11)
kk = Face Type (00 .. 04)
ll = Head Type (00 .. 04)
mm = Hair Type (00 .. 09)

Item Boxes GFX Modifier [Ralf]
201001C0 7C7F1B78
041001C4 386000xx
E2000001 80008000

xx = Box Type

00 - Orange Box
01 - Blue Box
02 - Green Box
03 - Meseta Box
04 - Red Box
05 - Blue Block
06 - Present
07 - Present (Big)
08 - Egg
09 - Pumpkin
0A - Flower
0B - Hitogata

Improved Enemy Attribute Text Colors [Ralf]
064D02A8 00000010
FF61E853 FFFFEA00
FFFD3C28 FFFD53E8

Enemy Attribute Text Color Modifier [Ralf]
044D02A8 FFrrggbb - Native  (Default: FFA5FFAA = Light Green)
044D02AC FFrrggbb - A.Beast (Default: FFF5FF99 = Light Yellow)
044D02B0 FFrrggbb - Machine (Default: FFFF958B = Light Red)
044D02B4 FFrrggbb - Dark    (Default: FFE1A9FF = Light Purple)

rr = Red   (00 .. FF)
gg = Green (00 .. FF)
bb = Blue  (00 .. FF)

Alt. Walk Through Water PFXs v1 [Ralf]

Christmas Present, Easter Egg & Jack-O'-Lantern: S-Rank Weapon Generator [Ralf]
203501CC 7C7E1B78
063501D0 00000068
83FE00F0 807E00D8
4BDB064D 38610008
3C808035 6084022C
38A000ww 4BDBC81D
38610008 4BDBC74D
2C030001 4082008C
386000ss 9861000A
7FE3FB78 38810008
4BE68FE1 2C030000
40810070 7FE3FB78
38810008 4BE68279
48000060 iijjkkll
mmnnoopp 00000000
E2000001 80008000

ww = S-Rank Weapon ID

70 - SABER
71 - SWORD
72 - BLADE
73 - PARTISAN
74 - SLICER
75 - GUN
76 - RIFLE
77 - MECHGUN
78 - SHOT
79 - CANE
7A - ROD
7B - WAND
7C - TWIN
7D - CLAW
7E - BAZOOKA
7F - NEEDLE
80 - SCYTHE
81 - HAMMER
82 - MOON
83 - PSYCHOGUN
84 - PUNCH
85 - WINDMILL
86 - HARISEN
87 - KATANA
88 - J-CUTTER
A5 - SWORDS
A6 - LAUNCHER
A7 - CARDS
A8 - KNUCKLE
A9 - AXE


ss = S-Rank Weapon Special

00 - None
01 - Jellen
02 - Zalure
03 - HP Restoration
04 - TP Restoration
05 - Burning
06 - Tempest
07 - Blizzard
08 - Arrest
09 - Chaos
0A - Hell
0B - Spirit
0C - Berserk
0D - Demon's
0E - Gush
0F - Geist
10 - King's


S-Rank Weapon Name

ii = Character 1
jj = Character 2
kk = Character 3
ll = Character 4
mm = Character 5
nn = Character 6
oo = Character 7
pp = Character 8


Characters

00 - None
41 - A
42 - B
43 - C
44 - D
45 - E
46 - F
47 - G
48 - H
49 - I
4A - J
4B - K
4C - L
4D - M
4E - N
4F - O
50 - P
51 - Q
52 - R
53 - S
54 - T
55 - U
56 - V
57 - W
58 - X
59 - Y
5A - Z

Damage Indicator Font Size Modifier [Ralf]
045DAA00 xxxxxxxx

xxxxxxxx = Font Size (IEEE-754 SP Floating-Point Number, Default: 3FB33333 = 1.4)

Large Damage Indicator Font [Ralf]
045DAA00 3FCCCCCD

Small Damage Indicator Font [Ralf]
045DAA00 3FA00000

Ultra Small Damage Indicator Font [Ralf]
045DAA00 3F800000


Damage Indicator Scroll Speed Modifier [Ralf]
045DAA30 xxxxxxxx

xxxxxxxx = Scroll Speed (IEEE-754 SP Floating-Point Number, Default: BFB33333 = -1.4)

Fast Damage Indicator Scrolling [Ralf]
045DAA30 C0000000

Slow Damage Indicator Scrolling [Ralf]
045DAA30 BF800000

Disable Damage Indicator Scrolling [Ralf]
045DAA30 00000000

This code generates Download Quests with embedded decryption key when
you download the quest files from a server. Note that such downloaded
quest files contain your actual PSO serial number and may compromise
your PSO server credentials.

Disable Deflicker Screen Filter [Ralf]
2038B24C 5463066C
0438B198 48000068
E2000001 80008000

Screen Gamma Correction: 1.7 [Ralf]
2038B24C 5463066C
04388AA4 38600001
E2000001 80008000

Screen Gamma Correction Modifier [Ralf]
2038B24C 5463066C
04388AA4 386000xx
E2000001 80008000

xx = Gamma Correction Value ID

00 - Gamma 1.0 (Default)
01 - Gamma 1.7
02 - Gamma 2.2
